Description: Rim and wall sherd of Attic pottery lip-cup; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed black below; exterior: reserved with narrow black band at junction of lip and handle zone; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Gardner 1888 / Naukratis II (p. 66, no. 809, pl. XXI, no. 809)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 687, no. 457)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0569) (Phase 1)
